plot: Afghanistan's first docudrama series. Mohammed Zahir head of the Kabul Criminal Investigation Unit reveals, for the first time, the most exciting and toughest cases cracked by his hardy bunch of Kabul detectives.
title: Truth Unveiled: Rah-e-Haqiqat
plot_es: Afghanistan's first docudrama series. Mohammed Zahir head of the Kabul Criminal Investigation Unit reveals, for the first time, the most exciting and toughest cases cracked by his hardy bunch of Kabul detectives.
plot_en: Afghanistan's first docudrama series. Mohammed Zahir head of the Kabul Criminal Investigation Unit reveals, for the first time, the most exciting and toughest cases cracked by his hardy bunch of Kabul detectives.
